class.name: InputEventVirtualButton
class.brief_description: Represents a virtual button being pressed or released.
class.description: Input event type for virtual custom buttons. Used by the Virtual Device system to simulate buttons.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the virtual touch action has been canceled.
If [code]true[/code], the button's state is pressed. If [code]false[/code], the button's state is released.
